name: Nanni Galli
introduction: Giovanni Giuseppe Gilberto "Nanni" Galli (2 October 1940 - 12 October 2019) was a Formula One driver from 1970 to 1973. In 20 starts for McLaren, March, Tecno. Ferrari or Williams, he scored no points, with his best finish a ninth place at the 1973 Brazilian Grand Prix. He did finish third in the non-championship 1972 Italian Republic Grand Prix in a Tecno. He also managed a moderate amount of success in sports cars of the era.
